item.title: Data Quality
item.description: HBR - If your data is bad your machine learning tools are useless Link: https://hbr.org/2018/04/if-your-data-is-bad-your-machine-learning-tools-are-useless “Garbage-in garbage-out” adage is equally applicable to machine learning. The quality demands of machine learning are steep - both at the training stage and when using the model in production. To properly train a predictive model, historical data must meet exceptionally broad and high quality standards: The data must be correct, properly labelled, deduped etc.
